subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo pledged to stay with Manchester United for at least the coming season but still wants to join Real Madrid, according to a Portuguese newspaper interview. Ronaldo told Publico he believed Real Madrid, the Spanish champion, submitted a “very high bid” after he expressed a desire to join them. But the Manchester United manager, Alex Ferguson, convinced him to stay next season when they met in Lisbon last month.
